Name: Helping Jr.
Author: Doc_synchronized

The neighbouring kingdom &6&l[kingdom]&f needs your help.
Their Queen left the kingdom without any members to help them.
It's about to start snowing and this year’s harvest can’t go to waste.
Will you help &9&l[name]&f, the farmer, build a small barn before the snow arrives?
I really hoped you would be the one, I thought you would be different...
I guess not. Hope you change your mind one day...
You can find them at xyz.

Dialog.&9&l[name]&f: Hi! Thank you so much for volunteering to help us, you couldn’t have come at a better time.
The snow will soon settle down and it’s going to get cold rather quickly.
The first material I need is stone… I need that for my foundation. That’s all for now.
OH! I completely forgot, but I would need you to get me &6&l85&f cobblestone and then smelt it in a furnace for me.
Are you even trying?
I am still waiting on the &6&l85 pieces of Stone&f you promised me.
No, no, no… this isn’t what I need.
I need stone!
You need to fire up your furnace and put the cobblestone in there…
Remember, I need &6&l85 pieces of Stone&f.
Oh yes! That is what I need!
Oh… you forgot a few pieces...
I need &6&l85 pieces of Stone&f.
Ahh, amazing [PLAYER], that’s exactly what I need!

Comment: Barn Schematic near NPC, progressing with each stage of items retrieved. With walking to chest animation.

Dialog.&9&l[name]&f: Could you be so kind to fetch me &6&l2 Glass Panes&f as well?
Are you even trying?
I am still waiting on the &6&l2 Glass Panes&f you promised me.
Oh, you silly goose!
It’s supposed to be two completely normal glass panes, not those big chunks of glass!
Don’t forget that I will need two of them.
That’s right, glass panes, but it seems you are a bit short.
I need two of them to build the small barn.
Please come back with more.
Thank you! Come back when you are ready, I have more things that has to be done! *cackles wickedly*.

Comment: Barn Schematic near NPC, progressing with each stage of items retrieved. With walking to chest animation.

Dialog.&9&l[name]&f: I need you to get &6&l62 Oak Logs&f including &6&la simple Oak Door&f.
After that then I will have everything to create a shelter for my harvest.
It seems like you haven’t gotten everything I have asked for.
Don’t worry, here I will say them again.
I need &6&l62 oak logs&f and &6&lan oak door&f; now shush I need to focus on my work.
I think I need a bit more materials to complete the build.
Would you mind going to the mines and gather more?
I think I mentioned that I needed &6&l62 Oak Logs&f and &6&la simple Oak Door&f.
That was the last items I needed.
Now I need to get to work! The snow is really beginning to look bad at a distance…
Thank you so much for your help.

Comment: Chest animation again but this time he give the player their reward.

Dialog.&9&l[name]&f: I cannot say how happy I am that you took your time to help me.
We won't struggle with food, and we have you to thank for that.
Take this *gives items* and remember that &6&l[kingdom]&f is in debt to [KINGDOM].
Farewell [PLAYER], I hope we see each other again some time!
